Follow live the opening of the international conference "Protecting the Children of War" at @ UNICEF https://t.co/BWfYdFjbV0
"The situation has unfortunately not really changed, on the contrary" @fhollande #protectchildren
"I think of all those young Syrians whose childhood was stolen." @fhollande #protectchildren
"I think of the Nigerian high school girls kidnapped by Boko Haram, many of whom are still detained ... The emergency is still there" @fhollande
"1.5 million children around the world are at risk of starvation if we do not intervene" @fhollande
"In 2007, we adopted the principles of peace here, which made it possible to engage in the long struggle for the liberation of child soldiers" @fhollande
President @fhollande salutes the action of Leila Zerrougi, UN representative for the fate of children in armed conflict
#protectchildren "those who prey on children tackle what man has most precious" @fhollande
"I see four priorities: advancing the rights of children in armed conflict - all states must join us" @fhollande
"It goes through the fight against the impunity of the torturers" @fhollande
"It is necessary to increase the resources allocated to the protection of children in the zones of conflict It is also necessary a development action"
@ fhollande "the 3rd priority is education and access to health, especially for children who have experienced horror"
"Of the 100 million humanitarian aid that France brings to Lebanon, half will be devoted to education" @fhollande
@ fhollande "we refuse schools and hospitals to be targeted by terrorists or states, as in Aleppo"
"Exemplarity is respect for the fundamental right of asylum" @fhollande
"I call on the UK to take responsibility for the issue of unaccompanied minors - agreements must be respected" @fhollande

Bhakti saints used music, poetry, local languages to bring God closer to people - they broke barriers of caste, class, religion & gender: PM
India is a land that is blessed with a rich cultural and intellectual milieu: PM @narendramodi
Our land is home to writers, scholars, saints and seers who have expressed themselves freely and fearlessly: PM @narendramodi
And whenever the history of human civilization entered into the era of knowledge, it is India that has always shown the way: PM
A false perception was created about India that India needed social, political and economic reform initiated by outsiders: PM
India’s soil is that soil from where change has always originated: PM @narendramodi
Our Saints integrated each and every citizen in their quest for social reform. Nobody was left outside the ambit: PM @narendramodi
Our civilization stands tall, overcoming obstacles: PM @narendramodi
Our Saints did things that may seem seemingly small but the impact was very big and this altered the course of our history: PM
In Hindu philosophy, time is accepted as a very important factor of the absolute -we are dik-kal- badhita- conditioned by space and time: PM
We all remember the role of Shri Narayana Guru in transforming Kerala: PM @narendramodi
Sri Sri Thakur Ramakrishna broke the mental barriers that keep us apart: PM @narendramodi
He lived the Muslim way of life, he lived the Christian way of life, he practised tantra: PM @narendramodi
"The Reality is one and the same;" he said, " the difference is in name and form" : PM @narendramodi
His teachings are relevant to us today, when we are confronted with people who use religion, caste to divide & create animosity: PM

A bi-partisan delegation of twenty-six members of the United States Congress jointly called on Prime Minister @narendramodi today.
PM welcomed the delegation. He said it augurs a good start to bilateral exchanges following the new U.S. Administration and Congress.
PM recalled his positive conversation with President @realDonaldTrump and the shared commitment to further strengthen India-US ties.
PM recognized the US Congress’ strong bipartisan support for the India-US partnership.
